snippet: The group, Move NY, recommends fees at the East River bridges and on Manhattan roads crossing 60th Street. Its plan could raise $1.5 billion in annual revenue.
abstract: Advocacy group Move NY will release proposal that would include creation of new tolls on four East River bridges in Manhattan; group says proposal would generate $1.5 billion annually, to be set aside for both transit system upgrades and improvements to city's roads and bridges.
lead_paragraph: The group, Move NY, recommends fees at the East River bridges and on Manhattan roads crossing 60th Street. Its plan could raise $1.5 billion in annual revenue.

headline.main: Group Seeks New Tolls in Manhattan to Pay for Region’s Transportation Needs
headline.print_headline: Group Seeks New Tolls in Manhattan to Pay for Region’s Transportation Needs
